text: The 1912 Southwestern Moundbuilders football team represented Southwestern College in the 1912 college football season. On November 8, 1912, Southwestern defeated Fairmont College (now Wichita State University) by a score of 41 to 3.College Football Data Warehouse Southwestern College Game By Game Summary (1910-1914) This was the first of a series of wins where Southwestern would beat or tie Fairmont ten of eleven games. This period of time earned the school the name "The Jinx" for many years to come. ==References== Southwestern Category:Southwestern Moundbuilders football seasons Southwestern football
title: 1912 Southwestern Moundbuilders football team
